items.sentence: Tom persuaded Mary to go back to Boston with him.
Tom photographed these buildings for the exhibit.
Tom wasn\'t able to buy enough food for everyone.
I didn\'t expect to see you at a place like this.
I didn\'t have the courage to tell her the truth.
I didn\'t know I was going to be giving a speech.
I didn\'t know I was supposed to be here at 2:30.
I didn\'t know Tom was going to Boston with Mary.
I didn\'t know that Tom was the one who did that.
I forgot to tell Tom I\'d be in Boston this week.
